songs.title: Toxic Love*
songs.lyrics:
[Snippet]
Back of the car with the blunts in our lyft
Never ever thought that I’d be getting high off a kiss
Grown man, heartbroke I thought Trix were for kids
Now I’m really thinking I won’t find a lover again

You lied when you told me that you want it forever
I Ball no matter the weather it’s forever
Another toxic love like, not again
Wash it down with klonopin

Give me one chance let me h-
